page.title: 16AMENITIES BURNDEN
page.content:
We carried out a survey about the area where the public lived.Their replies were quite moving! Q=Question A=Answer
Q. How long have you lived in this area? A. 18 years. Q. Do you like the area you live in? A. No Q. Do you think the council should spend more money on improving the area? A. Yes, improving the roads and making better use of derelict land. Q. Do you think this area has enough facilities? A. Not really. Q. Do you think the number of shops in this area is considerable? A. Yes, good variety.
